changeSet.sql: insert into role_resource (role_id, resource_id) values (1,1),(1,2),(1,3),(1,4),(2,2),(3,3); insert into user (name, nick_name, pass_word, role_id, phone, email, organization_id, is_system) values ("sysAdmin", "系统管理员", "$2a$10$WmmsYcOxDxIiWkehkQUcMuDO2tQSR1DxONU4Utklzlq1l1XNGoHSW", 1, "13367@163.com", "17600945065", 1, true), ("logAdmin", "日志审计员", "$2a$10$WmmsYcOxDxIiWkehkQUcMuDO2tQSR1DxONU4Utklzlq1l1XNGoHSW", 2, "13367@qq.com", "17600945066", 1, true);
